instruction: Interpret the lyrics to the song "Changes" by 2Pac
output: In "Changes" 2Pac talks about the struggles he endured growing up in an impoverished environment and the difficult decisions he had to make to survive. He reflects on how society brings about injustice and racism and how no matter the situation, we all must strive to make the best of it and ride out the hard times. The song conveys a sense of hope, resilience and courage to continue keeping the faith and staying strong no matter the odds.
